name: Simple Google Testimonials
author: Tropical Juice

sections.description:
This plugin lets you gather reviews and ratings from your customers. Your total score is being sent with Rich Snippets for Google.

Features:

  • Gather user reviews.
  • Total Score is being sent through Rich snippets to Google.
  • You can edit, deny or comment on reviews
  • More coming soon
  • English and Dutch translations.
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/simple-google-testimonial directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Add a page with the [testimonials] shortcode
  5. Gather and publish your reviews.
